_text_: <p>KonyOne's device detection database and heuristics identifies all browser categories from the most basic through different levels of HTML, CSS and JavaScript support, to all of the various HTML5-capable browsers in smartphones, tablets and the desktop. Depending on the type of browser, the user will be served markup, style and/or script appropriate and acceptable to their device, ensuring a solid experience and optimum UI.</p>
name: kony.ui.RichText
